question: Will BTC reach $75,000 by end of February 2026?
reasoning: Volatility regime underpriced. BTC needs 7-10% move in 13 days. Historical base rates: 10% moves happen 2-3x per month in crypto. Bull cycle positioning (post-2024 recovery) creates asymmetric upside. Feb month-end rebalancing + Fed commentary windows = catalyst risk. True probability ~48-52% vs market 42.5%.

question: Will Russia and Ukraine reach a ceasefire by March 31, 2026?
reasoning: Market underprices diplomatic momentum. Trump policy shift + 7-day hold threshold + February-March window = higher true probability (~67-70%) vs market 41.5%. Base rates show pessimism bias on peace prospects.
